testcase.name: TC01_Amazon iPhone Search Test
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici amazon sayfasina gider......................................passed And iPhone icin arama yapar.................................................passed Then sonuclarin iPhone icerdigini test eder.................................passed

testcase.classname: US1003 parametre ile step definitions olusturma
testcase.name: T05_Parametre kullanimi
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici amazon sayfasina gider......................................passed And "iPhone" icin arama yapar...............................................passed Then sonuclarin "iPhone" icerdigini test eder...............................passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed

testcase.name: TC10 dogru username,yanlis sifre ile giris yapilamaz
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "HMCUrl" sayfasina gider....................................passed Then login linkine tiklar...................................................passed And kullanici adi olarak "HMCValidUsername" girer...........................passed And password olarak "HMCWrongPassword" girer................................passed Then login butonuna basar...................................................passed And giris yapilamdigini gorur...............................................passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed
